[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Module Integration: AdminCap usage] Are all admin functions consistently checking AdminCap ownership? Can AdminCap be transferred breaking access control? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Module Integration: OperatorCap usage] Do operator functions verify OperatorCap hasn't been frozen before allowing operations? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Module Integration: vault module] Do wrapper functions in manage.move properly propagate all error conditions from vault module? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Module Integration: reward_manager] Is there proper synchronization between vault shares and reward_manager accounting after configuration changes? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Module Integration: oracle_config] Do oracle configuration changes immediately affect ongoing operations or are prices cached? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: deposit_fee] Does set_deposit_fee() accept u64::MAX? Can this cause overflow in fee calculation (amount * fee / RATE_SCALING)? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: withdraw_fee] Can withdraw_fee be set equal to RATE_SCALING (100%), causing entire withdrawal to be fee? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: loss_tolerance] Can loss_tolerance u256 parameter overflow in multiplication with usd_value? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: locking_time] Can locking_time parameters be set such that locking_time_for_cancel > locking_time_for_withdraw, creating illogical flow? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: asset_type] Can asset_type String be empty string or contain null bytes breaking oracle lookups? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: decimals] Can decimals parameter be 0 or >18 causing price conversion errors? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: update_interval] If update_interval overflows when added to timestamp, can this break staleness checks? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: amount in retrieve_fee] Can amount=u64::MAX cause arithmetic overflow in balance operations? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: op_cap_id] Can op_cap_id be zero address (0x0) to DoS freeze/unfreeze operations? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Parameter: enabled bool] Is there validation that enabled parameter is actually needed (checking current status before changing)? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Access Control: AdminCap] Can AdminCap be stored in a shared object accessible by multiple parties, weakening admin security? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Access Control: OperatorCap] After create_operator_cap(), can OperatorCap be wrapped in another object to bypass freeze checks? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Access Control: Cap lifecycle] Is there any mechanism to revoke or expire AdminCap/OperatorCap? If not, can compromised caps persist indefinitely? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Access Control: Function visibility] Are all functions appropriately marked public vs public(package)? Can external contracts call sensitive functions? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Access Control: Parameter injection] Can attacker pass malicious vault/operation/oracle_config objects to functions to affect wrong vault? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Access Control: Capability cloning] Can sui::object::id(cap) be reused to create duplicate capabilities? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Authorization: Mixed caps] Can operator call admin functions by crafting capability objects with same ID? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [Authorization: Cap transfer] Can capabilities be transferred to contracts that auto-execute admin operations? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [State: Vault status] Are vault status transitions properly gated? Can vault go from DISABLED directly to DURING_OPERATION? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/manage.move] [State: Operation lifecycle] If vault status changes mid-operation, are operation lifecycle checks still valid? (Critical)
